txt.en: Ingold can be found at the North-gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold.

'Most interesting! I shall send these to Minas Tirith so that they may be studied more but honestly I have never seen such metals before. It looks as if they were unearthed from deep within the ground. Perhaps somewhere near Rhûn?'
Jal Vârsha: Axes of the Sûhalar
Jal Vârsha can be found along the northern Rammas in southern Talath Anor.\n\nYou should collect Sûhalar axes and metal in the camp for Ingold.

'We must learn more about this new foe, the Sûhalar, if we are to defeat them. Their weapons intrigue me. Perhaps if we were to gather some of their axes and metals, we can learn more about where these axe-men come from.\n\n'There is a Sûhalar encampment against the northern Rammas, not too far from here.'
The Sûhalar Easterlings have constructed an encampment at the base of the northern Rammas. Ingold wishes to learn more about these hostile new foes.
